channel.title: Shadow Faction and Class
channel.description:
2 of this class would show up:
> **Dark Lord(Shadow Special)** > > Passive: Soul Shield: Consume a soul to stay alive > > Night Ability 1: Consume: Replace your target with your partner. Their class will be based on the target's class type. Costs one soul.
> **Phantom (Shadow Social)** > > Day Ability: Shadowy Alteration: Force your target to vote for your second target. They may not change their vote. > > Night Ability: Stalk: See your first target's whispers the next day and force them to kill your second target.
> **name needed (Shadow Offensive)** > > Passive: Spectral: Cannot be occupied or have their target change. > > Night Ability: Control: Occupy your first target, and kill your second target.
> **name needed (Shadow Investigative)** > > Night Ability: Examine: Learn your first target's class. Kill your second target.
> **name needed (Shadow Support)** > > Night Ability: Alter: Make your first target think they were attacked and healed. Kill your second target.
Random idea I had. I really love possessor.
Notes: CW can stop Consume. All killing abilities steal target's soul. The whole faction shares souls.
Also it probably needs a day ability or something to put it on the same kill rate as Cult or Unseen.
> **[color=LightBlue]Lightbringer (Blue Dragon Investigative)[/color]** > > Night Ability: Repel the Darkness: Check if one person is a Shadow. If they are, destroy one of their souls. > > Night Ability 2: Shine: Occupy your target. If they are a Shadow take away all of their souls. 1 use.

item.title: Shadow Faction and Class
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
2 of this class would show up:

Dark Lord(Shadow Special)

Passive: Soul Shield: Consume a soul to stay alive

Night Ability 1: Consume: Replace your target with your partner. Their class will be based on the target’s class type. Costs one soul.

Phantom (Shadow Social)

Day Ability: Shadowy Alteration: Force your target to vote for your second target. They may not change their vote.

Night Ability: Stalk: See your first target’s whispers the next day and force them to kill your second target.

name needed (Shadow Offensive)

Passive: Spectral: Cannot be occupied or have their target change.

Night Ability: Control: Occupy your first target, and kill your second target.

name needed (Shadow Investigative)

Night Ability: Examine: Learn your first target’s class. Kill your second target.

name needed (Shadow Support)

Night Ability: Alter: Make your first target think they were attacked and healed. Kill your second target.

Random idea I had. I really love possessor.

Notes: CW can stop Consume. All killing abilities steal target’s soul. The whole faction shares souls.

Also it probably needs a day ability or something to put it on the same kill rate as Cult or Unseen.

Lightbringer (Blue Dragon Investigative)

Night Ability: Repel the Darkness: Check if one person is a Shadow. If they are, destroy one of their souls.

Night Ability 2: Shine: Occupy your target. If they are a Shadow take away all of their souls. 1 use.
